summary:
ISSUES
Critical:
- The "How It Works" page failed the web performance test. It is essential to investigate and optimize this page to improve its loading time and pass the test.
insights: Time to First Byte (TTFB) is consistently low across all pages, indicating that the server response time is adequate.
The blog page has a slightly longer Time to Interactive (TTI) due to its higher First Contentful Paint (FCP) value. Investigating and optimizing FCP can help improve TTI.
The pricing page has the best overall performance, likely due to its simpler design and fewer resources. Use this page as a benchmark for optimizing other pages.
